trans-unit.source: Now that you've learned the basics of Azure table storage, follow these links to learn about more complex storage tasks.
trans-unit.target: Now that you've learned the basics of Azure table storage, follow these links to learn about more complex storage tasks.

trans-unit.source: View the table service reference documentation in the <linkText>Storage Client Library for .NET</linkText><title></title> reference for complete details about available APIs.
trans-unit.target: View the table service reference documentation in the <linkText>Storage Client Library for .NET</linkText><title></title> reference for complete details about available APIs.

trans-unit.source: Learn about more advanced tasks you can perform with Azure Storage at <linkText>Storing and Accessing Data in Azure</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Learn about more advanced tasks you can perform with Azure Storage at <linkText>Storing and Accessing Data in Azure</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to simplify the code you write to work with Azure Storage by using the <linkText>Azure WebJobs SDK</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: Learn how to simplify the code you write to work with Azure Storage by using the <linkText>Azure WebJobs SDK</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: View more feature guides to learn about additional options for storing data in Azure.
trans-unit.target: View more feature guides to learn about additional options for storing data in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Use <linkText>Blob Storage</linkText><title></title> to store structured data.
trans-unit.target: Use <linkText>Blob Storage</linkText><title></title> to store structured data.

trans-unit.source: Use <linkText>Table Storage</linkText><title></title> to store structured data.
trans-unit.target: Use <linkText>Table Storage</linkText><title></title> to store structured data.

trans-unit.source: Use <linkText>SQL Database</linkText><title></title> to store relational data.
trans-unit.target: Use <linkText>SQL Database</linkText><title></title> to store relational data.
